title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Business Analyst, Computer Scientist, Public Speaker (801) 318-6464 | andrewjseaman17@gmail.com

My Linkedin page



Current student of Brigham Young University - Idaho dedicated to studying, diligence, and hard work. Intrinsically motivated towards excellence in menial and major tasks desiring personal success for public gain. Creativity, discovery, and personal interest drive a habit of learning at all times in a varied field of interests.
Personal passions include music, sports, computer science, and other areas of interest.
Pursuing a Bachelors of Science, Business Analytics and a Minor, Computer Science (Expected graduation: Fall 2026).




Topics: - Business Analytics; Data Science; Computer Science
Programming Languages: - Python, C#, MySQL, R, and Markdown (Quarto).
Technologies: - Excel; Google Sheets
Soft Skills - Public Speaking; Spanish Fluency; Writing; Organization; Teamwork; Conflict Resolution



Machine learning, Data structures, Advanced data modeling and predictive analysis for business efficiency





Idaho, Rexburg Fall 2019 - Present Brigham Young University - Idaho Bachelors of Science, Business Analytics Minor, Computer Science - Junior, On-Campus student - Sales Society, Men’s Choir, Beginning Orchestra
Utah, Orem September 2016 - May 2019 Orem High School High School Diploma - GPA: 3.97, Graduated with Honors. - National Honors Society (2015-2019), Cross Country Team, Advanced Choir, Spanish, French, Drama, AP and Honors Classes.



South Dakota & Illinois November 2023 - Present Vantage Marketing Sales account manager & Recruiter - Engaged in active recruitment. Performing door-to-door sales for Insight Pest Control. Team historically produces 2.5 million in serviced revenue.
Delaware & Pennsylvania July 2023 - August 2023 Greenix Pest Control Sales account manager - Executed door-to-door sales. Team collectively produced 1.2 million in serviced revenue.
Maryland & Virginia March 2023 - July 2023 Pointe Marketing Sales account manager - Executed door-to-door sales for Frontline Pest Control. Team collectively produced 1.8 million in serviced revenue.
Orem, UT June 2015 - October 2017 Malawi’s Pizza Dishwasher, Busser, Line Cook, Cashier - Cleaned dishes in a high paced environment. Made food in several stations (pizza, pasta, salad). Trained in cashiering.
Lehi, UT January 2015 - December 2016 The Bella Bazar Executive Assistant - Streamlined setup processes, improved customer service standards, ensured proper food handling, and upheld sanitation protocols.



Pennsylvania Philadelphia Mission September 2020 - October 2022 The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints Volunteer Minister - Spanish Speaking - Commissioned by the President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Relocated frequently to serve communities and primarily engage in proselytizing for a two-year period. - Directed by President Daniel F. Dunnigan, and President Justin Harding, formerly Chief of Staff to Utah Governor Gary Herbert.
Yucatan, Mexico July 2018 Humanitarian Especially for Youth Volunteer Builder - Spanish Speaking - Played a key role in construction of a school’s foundation alongside local workers for young and abused girls reclaimed from abusive families for protection and success.
Orem, UT January 2012 - December 2018 The Boy Scouts of America (BSA) Eagle Scout - Achieved esteemed rank of Eagle Scout after 7 years (December 2018). Earned merit badges through skill development and community engagement. These experiences contributed to enrichment as a citizen.



Orem, UT & Rexburg, ID September 2013 - April 2020 Choral Artist - Involved in 6 choirs; Institutions (3): Canyon View Jr. High School, Orem High School, Brigham Young University - Idaho.
UT & European Nations September 2018 - July 2019 The Utah Ambassadors of Music European Choir Tour Nominee & Participant - Selected as a three-times nominee for The Utah Ambassadors of Music. - Nominated by Sterling Keys, High School choir director, for participation in bi-annual European Choir Tour (2019). - Concert host countries include: London, France, Switzerland, Austria, Italy, and Germany.
